languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете, что склеп выглядит удивительно... незагаженным. Даже за пару лет пребывания здесь выродки должны были обратить его в неописуемый кошмар, но следы осквернения весьма локальны и далеко не так многочисленны.{/n}

{n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете, что склеп выглядит удивительно... незагаженным. Даже за пару лет пребывания здесь выродки должны были обратить его в неописуемый кошмар, но следы осквернения весьма локальны и далеко не так многочисленны.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled. Even after a couple of years, the heretics would have likely turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption here are localised and not nearly as many.{/n}

{n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled. Even after a couple of years, the heretics would have likely turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption here are localised and not nearly as many.{/n}

{n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled. Even after years undisturbed, though the heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

{n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled. Even after years undisturbed, though the heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

{n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

{n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez que la crypte a l'air étonnamment... intacte, même après toutes ces années. Les hérétiques auraient pu tout saccager depuis longtemps, malgré tout, les signes de corruption restent rares.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez que la crypte a l'air étonnamment... intacte, même après toutes ces années. Les hérétiques auraient pu tout saccager depuis longtemps, malgré tout, les signes de corruption restent rares.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te fijas en que la cripta está sorprendentemente... no profanada, para haber pasado tantos años infestada. Los herejes podrían haberla convertido en una pesadilla inconcebible, y, sin embargo, los símbolos de corrupción son escasos y están limitados a esta zona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te fijas en que la cripta está sorprendentemente... no profanada, para haber pasado tantos años infestada. Los herejes podrían haberla convertido en una pesadilla inconcebible, y, sin embargo, los símbolos de corrupción son escasos y están limitados a esta zona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你注意到，明明过了这么多年，这座地下墓穴看起来却……几乎没太遭到玷污。那些异端分子本可以把这里变成让人不忍卒视的垃圾堆，但这里却并没有太多腐化的迹象，而且所有腐化迹象仅仅局限在这片区域。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，明明过了这么多年，这座地下墓穴看起来却……几乎没太遭到玷污。那些异端分子本可以把这里变成让人不忍卒视的垃圾堆，但这里却并没有太多腐化的迹象，而且所有腐化迹象仅仅局限在这片区域。{/n}

languages.text: {n}長い年月を経ても、地下聖堂は驚くほど汚れていない。異端者たちによって、想像を絶する悪夢のような姿に変えられていたかもしれないが、腐敗の兆候はほとんどなく、局所的なものだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}長い年月を経ても、地下聖堂は驚くほど汚れていない。異端者たちによって、想像を絶する悪夢のような姿に変えられていたかもしれないが、腐敗の兆候はほとんどなく、局所的なものだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass die Krypta überraschend ... ungeschändet aussieht, selbst nach so vielen Jahren. Die Ketzer hätten sie in einen unvorstellbaren Albtraum verwandeln können, doch es gibt nur wenige Anzeichen der Verderbnis und sie sind auf diesen Bereich beschränkt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass die Krypta überraschend ... ungeschändet aussieht, selbst nach so vielen Jahren. Die Ketzer hätten sie in einen unvorstellbaren Albtraum verwandeln können, doch es gibt nur wenige Anzeichen der Verderbnis und sie sind auf diesen Bereich beschränkt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mahzenin şaşırtıcı derecede... Bozulmamış olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Bunca yıl geçmiş olmasına rağmen. Kâfirler onu tanınmayacak hâldeki bir kâbusa dönüştürebilirmiş ancak buradaki yozlaşma ibareleri çok az ve çok seyrek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice that the crypt looks surprisingly... undefiled, even after all these years. The heretics could have turned it into an inconceivable nightmare, yet the signs of corruption are few and localised here.{/n}
